title: Ken Ham Says Liberals Spread Lies About Him and Donald Trump (Spoiler: We Just Quote Them Verbatim)
text:
February 3, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
What do Creationist Ken Ham and Donald Trump have in common? 
They’re liars who believe their own lies. No wonder Ham feels the need to defend the President : 
Left wing secular media is doing to Trump what they’ve done to @AiG for years–false accusations, lies, misinformation, censorship & more 
He has it completely wrong, as usual. The “left wing secular media” doesn’t need to create false accusations, lies, or misinformation to make Ham or Trump look bad. All we need to do is rewind the videotape and quote them verbatim. Their words speak for themselves. 
When they get something wrong, which happens fairly often, we point out the facts. 
The concern from the side defending reality is that these people have access to money and power. They have influence. And their actions make our world a shittier, dumber place. What’s amazing is how sensitive they are to the criticism. They don’t respond with rebuttals; they respond with whiny claims of persecution. As if white male Christians never catch a break… 
At least they still have Twitter.
